thread.title: BRIEF-Focus Media Network Appoints ‍Liu Xiaodong As Executive Director & Chairman Of Board​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Focus Media Network Appoints ‍Liu Xiaodong As Executive Director & Chairman Of Board​

organizations.name: brief-focus media network appoints ‍liu xiaodong as executive

text:
Jan 12 (Reuters) - Focus Media Network Ltd:
* ‍LIU XIAODONG HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, CHAIRMAN OF BOARD​
* ‍AN XILEI HAS CEASED TO BE CHAIRMAN OF BOARD BUT HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS DEPUTY CHAIRMAN OF BOARD​
* ‍LAM HOI YU NICKI HAS RESIGNED AS AN EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
